bugReportExample.title: Starting and ending times of trading sessions for trading instruments are not displayed in the "Trading" section during application runtime (application restart required)

stepsToReproduce.step: 2. Tap on "Trading instrument tab 23.X" to start / end trading
3. Wait for start / end of trading session according to The schedule

bugReportExample.expectedResult: Starting / ending time of trading sessions is displayed
bugReportExample.actualResult: Application is not responded to Starting / ending times of trading sessions
